[21] sa"nkhepavitthaaranayena tathaa tathaa hi,
[27] dhamma.m pakaasayati esa yathaa yathaassa.
[26] saddhammatejavihata.m vilaya.m kha.nena,
[22] veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payaatiiti..
[06] evamettha taavatvato veditabbo vinicchayo.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa"nkhato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0119^ea^ cakkhudhaatu taava jaatito eko dhammotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati cakkhupasaadavasena, tathaa sotaghaanajivhaakaayaruupasaddagandharasadhaatuyo sotappasaadaadivasena, pho.t.thabbadhaatu pana pathaviitejovaayovasena tayo dhammaati sa"nkha.m gacchati. cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu kusalaakusalavipaakavasena ^a^V2.0116^ea^ dve dhammaati sa"nkha.m gacchati, tathaa sotaghaanajivhaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyo. manodhaatu pana pa~ncadvaaraavajjanakusalaakusalavipaakasampa.ticchanavasena tayo dhammaati sa"nkha.m gacchati. dhammadhaatu ti.n.na.m aruupakkhandhaana.m so.lasanna.m sukhumaruupaana.m asa"nkhataaya ca dhaatuyaa vasena viisati dhammaati sa"nkha.m gacchati. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu sesakusalaakusalaabyaakatavi~n~naa.navasena chasattati dhammaati sa"nkha.m gacchati. evamettha sa"nkhatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccayaa^eb^ti ettha ca cakkhudhaatu taava cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa vippayuttapurejaataatthiavigatanissayindriyapaccayaana.m vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, ruupadhaatu purejaataatthiavigataaramma.napaccayaana.m vasena catuuhi paccayehi paccayo hoti. eva.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuaadiina.m sotadhaatusaddadhaatuaadayo. pa~ncanna.m pana nesa.m aavajjanamanodhaatu anantarasamanantaranatthivigataanantaruupanissayavasena pa~ncahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, taa ca pa~ncapi sampa.ticchanamanodhaatuyaa. tathaa sampa.ticchanamanodhaatu santiira.namanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa, saa ca vo.t.thabbanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa, vo.t.thabbanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ca javanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa. javanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu pana anantaraaya javanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa tehi ceva pa~ncahi aasevanapaccayena caati chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. esa taava pa~ncadvaare nayo.

[03] manodvaare pana bhava"ngamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu aavajjanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa. aavajjanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ca javanamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa purimehi pa~ncahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. dhammadhaatu pana sattannampi vi~n~naa.nadhaatuuna.m sahajaataa~n~nama~n~nanissayasampayuttaatthiavigataadiihi bahudhaa paccayo hoti. cakkhudhaatuaadayo pana ekaccaa ca dhammadhaatu ekaccaaya manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa aaramma.napaccayaadiihipi paccayaa honti. cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuaadiina~nca na kevala.m cakkhuruupaadayo paccayaa honti, atha kho aalokaadayopi. tenaahu pubbaacariyaa --

[02] ``cakkhuruupaalokamanasikaare ^a^M2.0120^ea^ pa.ticca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m. sotasaddavivaramanasikaare pa.ticca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m. ghaanagandhavaayumanasikaare pa.ticca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m. jivhaarasaaapamanasikaare pa.ticca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m. kaayapho.t.thabbapathaviimanasikaare pa.ticca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m. bhava"ngamanadhammamanasikaare pa.ticca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na''nti.
[03] ayamettha ^a^V2.0117^ea^ sa"nkhepo. vitthaarato pana paccayappabhedo pa.ticcasamuppaadaniddese aavibhavissatiiti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ^b^da.t.thabbato^eb^ti da.t.thabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. sabbaa eva hi sa"nkhatadhaatuyo pubbantaaparantavivittato dhuvasubhasukhattabhaavasu~n~nato paccayaayattavuttito ca da.t.thabbaa.

[01] visesato panettha bheritala.m viya cakkhudhaatu da.t.thabbaa, da.n.do viya ruupadhaatu, saddo viya cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu. tathaa aadaasatala.m viya cakkhudhaatu, mukha.m viya ruupadhaatu, mukhanimitta.m viya cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu. atha vaa ucchutilaa viya cakkhudhaatu, yantacakkaya.t.thi viya ruupadhaatu, ucchurasatelaani viya cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu. tathaa adharaara.nii viya cakkhudhaatu, uttaraara.nii viya ruupadhaatu, aggi viya cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu. esa nayo sotadhaatuaadiisu.
[01] manodhaatu pana yathaasambhavato cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuaadiina.m purecaraanucaraa viya da.t.thabbaa.

[01] dhammadhaatuyaa vedanaakkhandho sallamiva suulamiva ca da.t.thabbo. sa~n~naasa"nkhaarakkhandhaa vedanaasallasuulayogaaaaturaa viya, puthujjanaana.m vaa sa~n~naa aasaadukkhajananato rittamu.t.thi viya. ayathaabhuccanimittagaahakato vanamigo viya. sa"nkhaaraa pa.tisandhiya.m pakkhipanato a"ngaarakaasuya.m khipanakapurisaa viya. jaati dukkhaanubandhato raajapurisaanubandhacoraa viya. sabbaanatthaavahassa khandhasantaanassa hetuto visarukkhabiijaani viya. ruupa.m naanaavidhupaddavanimittato khuracakka.m viya da.t.thabba.m. asa"nkhataa pana dhaatu amatato santato khemato ca da.t.thabbaa. kasmaa? sabbaanatthaavahassa pa.tipakkhabhuutattaa.

[03] manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^M2.0121^ea^ aaramma.nesu vavatthaanaabhaavato ara~n~namakka.to viya, duddamanato assakha.lu"nko viya, yatthakaamanipaatito vehaasakkhittada.n.do viya, lobhadosaadinaanappakaarakilesavesayogato ra"ngana.to viya da.t.thabbaati.
[06] iti saadhujanapaamojjatthaaya kate visuddhimagge
[06] pa~n~naabhaavanaadhikaare
[06] aayatanadhaatuniddeso naama
[06] pannarasamo paricchedo.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ dhaatuuna.m ^a^M2.0122^ea^ ^a^V2.0118^ea^ anantara.m uddi.t.thaani pana ^b^indriyaanii^eb^ti baaviisatindriyaani -- cakkhundriya.m sotindriya.m ghaanindriya.m jivhindriya.m kaayindriya.m manindriya.m itthindriya.m purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m sukhindriya.m dukkhindriya.m somanassindriya.m domanassindriya.m upekkhindriya.m saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m a~n~nindriya.m a~n~naataavindriyanti. tattha --
[21] atthato lakkha.naadiihi, kamato ca vijaaniyaa.
[22] bhedaabhedaa tathaa kiccaa, bhuumito ca vinicchaya.m..

[03] tattha cakkhaadiina.m taava cakkhatiiti cakkhuutiaadinaa nayena attho pakaasito. pacchimesu pana tiisu pa.thama.m pubbabhaage ana~n~naata.m amata.m pada.m catusaccadhamma.m vaa jaanissaamiiti eva.m pa.tipannassa uppajjanato indriya.t.thasambhavato ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyanti vutta.m. dutiya.m aajaananato indriya.t.thasambhavato ca a~n~nindriya.m. tatiya.m a~n~naataavino catuusu saccesu ni.t.thita~n~naa.nakiccassa khii.naasavassa uppajjanato indriya.t.thasambhavato ca a~n~naataavindriya.m.

[03] ko pana nesa.m ^b^indriya.t.tho^eb^ naamaati? indali"nga.t.tho indriya.t.tho. indadesita.t.tho indriya.t.tho. indadi.t.tha.t.tho indriya.t.tho. indasi.t.tha.t.tho indriya.t.tho. indaju.t.tha.t.tho indriya.t.tho. so sabbopi idha yathaayoga.m yujjati. bhagavaa hi sammaasambuddho paramissariyabhaavato indo. kusalaakusala~nca kamma.m, kammesu kassaci issariyaabhaavato. tenevettha kammasa~njanitaani taava indriyaani kusalaakusalakamma.m ^a^V2.0119^ea^ ulli"ngenti. tena ca si.t.thaaniiti indali"nga.t.thena indasi.t.tha.t.thena ca indriyaani. sabbaaneva panetaani bhagavataa yathaabhuutato pakaasitaani abhisambuddhaani caati indadesita.t.thena indadi.t.tha.t.thena ca indriyaani. teneva bhagavataa munindena kaanici gocaraasevanaaya kaanici bhaavanaasevanaaya sevitaaniiti indaju.t.tha.t.thenaapi indriyaani.

[03] apica ^a^M2.0123^ea^ aadhipaccasa"nkhaatena issariya.t.thenaapi etaani indriyaani. cakkhuvi~n~naa.naadippavattiya~nhi cakkhaadiina.m siddha.m aadhipacca.m, tasmi.m tikkhe tikkhattaa mande ca mandattaati. aya.m taavettha atthato vinicchayo.

[03] ^b^lakkha.naadiihii^eb^ti lakkha.narasapaccupa.t.thaanapada.t.thaanehipi cakkhaadiina.m vinicchaya.m vijaaniyaati attho. taani ca nesa.m lakkha.naadiini khandhaniddese vuttaaneva. pa~n~nindriyaadiini hi cattaari atthato amohoyeva. sesaani tattha saruupeneva aagataani.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ^b^kamato^eb^ti ayampi desanaakkamova. tattha ajjhattadhamme pari~n~naaya ariyabhuumipa.tilaabho hotiiti attabhaavapariyaapannaani cakkhundriyaadiini pa.thama.m desitaani. so pana attabhaavo ya.m dhamma.m upaadaaya itthiiti vaa purisoti vaa sa"nkha.m gacchati, aya.m soti nidassanattha.m tato itthindriya.m purisindriya~nca. so duvidhopi jiivitindriyapa.tibaddhavuttiiti ~naapanattha.m tato jiivitindriya.m. yaava tassa pavatti, taava etesa.m vedayitaana.m anivatti. ya~nca ki~nci vedayita.m, sabba.m ta.m dukkhanti ~naapanattha.m tato sukhindriyaadiini. ta.mnirodhattha.m pana ete dhammaa bhaavetabbaati pa.tipattidassanattha.m tato saddhaadiini. imaaya pa.tipattiyaa esa dhammo pa.thama.m attani paatubhavatiiti pa.tipattiyaa amoghabhaavadassanattha.m tato ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m. tasseva phalattaa tato anantara.m bhaavetabbato ca tato a~n~nindriya.m. tato para.m bhaavanaaya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmi.m natthi ki~nci uttari kara.niiyanti ~naapanattha.m ante paramassaasabhuuta.m a~n~naataavindriya.m desitanti ayamettha kamo.
[03] ^b^bhedaabhedaa^eb^ti jiivitindriyasseva cettha bhedo. ta~nhi ruupajiivitindriya.m aruupajiivitindriyanti duvidha.m hoti. sesaana.m abhedoti evamettha bhedaabhedato vinicchaya.m vijaaniyaa.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiccaa^eb^ti ^a^V2.0120^ea^ ki.m indriyaana.m kiccanti ce. cakkhundriyassa taava ``cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo''ti vacanato ya.m ta.m indriyapaccayabhaavena saadhetabba.m attano tikkhamandaadibhaavena cakkhuvi~n~naa.naadidhammaana.m tikkhamandaadisa"nkhaata.m attaakaaraanuvattaapana.m, ida.m kicca.m. eva.m sotaghaanajivhaakaayaana.m. manindriyassa pana ^a^M2.0124^ea^ sahajaatadhammaana.m attano vasavattaapana.m. jiivitindriyassa sahajaatadhammaanupaalana.m. itthindriyapurisindriyaana.m itthipurisali"nganimittakuttaakappaakaaraanuvidhaana.m. sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassindriyaana.m sahajaatadhamme abhibhavitvaa yathaasaka.m o.laarikaakaaraanupaapana.m. upekkhindriyassa santapa.niitamajjhattaakaaraanupaapana.m. saddhaadiina.m pa.tipakkhaabhibhavana.m sampayuttadhammaana~nca pasannaakaaraadibhaavasampaapana.m. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyassa sa.myojanattayappahaana~nceva sampayuttaana~nca tappahaanaabhimukhabhaavakara.na.m. a~n~nindriyassa kaamaraagabyaapaadaaditanukara.nappahaana~nceva sahajaataana~nca attano vasaanuvattaapana.m. a~n~naataavindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahaana~nceva amataabhimukhabhaavapaccayataa ca sampayuttaananti evamettha kiccato vinicchaya.m vijaaniyaa.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhuumito^eb^ti cakkhusotaghaanajivhaakaayaitthipurisasukhadukkhadomanassindriyaani cettha kaamaavacaraaneva. manindriyajiivitindriyaupekkhindriyaani saddhaaviiriyasatisamaadhipa~n~nindriyaani ca catubhuumipariyaapannaani. somanassindriya.m kaamaavacararuupaavacaralokuttaravasena bhuumittayapariyaapanna.m. avasaane tii.ni lokuttaraanevaati evamettha bhuumitopi vinicchaya.m vijaaneyya. eva.m hi vijaananto --
[21] sa.mvegabahulo bhikkhu, .thito indriyasa.mvare.
[22] indriyaani pari~n~naaya, dukkhassanta.m karissatiiti..
[06] ida.m indriyaana.m vitthaarakathaamukha.m.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ tadanantaraani pana ^b^saccaanii^eb^ti cattaari ariyasaccaani -- dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhasamudayo ^a^V2.0121^ea^ ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodho ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasaccanti. tattha --
[21] vibhaagato ^a^M2.0125^ea^ nibbacana, lakkha.naadippabhedato.
[22] atthatthuddhaarato ceva, anuunaadhikato tathaa..
[21] kamato jaatiaadiina.m, nicchayaa ~naa.nakiccato.
[22] antogadhaana.m pabhedaa, upamaato catukkato..
[21] su~n~natekavidhaadiihi, sabhaagavisabhaagato.
[22] vinicchayo veditabbo, vi~n~nunaa saasanakkame..

[03] tattha ^b^vibhaagato^eb^ti dukkhaadiina.m hi cattaaro cattaaro atthaa vibhattaa tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa, ye dukkhaadiini abhisamentehi abhisametabbaa. yathaaha -- ``dukkhassa pii.lana.t.tho sa"nkhata.t.tho santaapa.t.tho vipari.naama.t.tho, ime cattaaro dukkhassa dukkha.t.thaa tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa. samudayassa aayuuhana.t.tho nidaana.t.tho sa.myoga.t.tho palibodha.t.tho. nirodhassa nissara.na.t.tho viveka.t.tho asa"nkhata.t.tho amata.t.tho. maggassa niyyaana.t.tho hetu.t.tho dassana.t.tho adhipateyya.t.tho. ime cattaaro maggassa magga.t.thaa tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 2.8). tathaa ``dukkhassa pii.lana.t.tho sa"nkhata.t.tho santaapa.t.tho vipari.naama.t.tho abhisamaya.t.tho''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 2.11) evamaadi. iti eva.m vibhattaana.m catunna.m catunna.m atthaana.m vasena dukkhaadiini veditabbaaniiti. aya.m taavettha vibhaagato vinicchayo.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ nibbacanalakkha.naadippabhedatoti ettha pana ^b^nibbacanato^eb^ taava idha ^b^du^eb^-iti aya.m saddo kucchite dissati. kucchita.m hi putta.m dupputtoti vadanti. ^b^kha.m^eb^-saddo pana tucche. tuccha.m hi aakaasa.m ``kha''nti vuccati. ida~nca pa.thamasacca.m kucchita.m anekaupaddavaadhi.t.thaanato. tuccha.m baalajanaparikappitadhuvasubhasukhattabhaavavirahitato. tasmaa kucchitattaa tucchattaa ca ^b^dukkha^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^sa.m-^eb^iti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ ca aya.m saddo ``samaagamo sameta''ntiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 2.396; vibha0 199) sa.myoga.m diipeti. ^b^u^eb^-iti aya.m ``uppanna.m udita''ntiaadiisu (dha0 sa0 1; mahaava0 84) uppatti.m. ^b^aya^eb^-saddo kaara.na.m diipeti. ida~ncaapi dutiyasacca.m avasesapaccayasamaayoge sati dukkhassuppattikaara.na.m. iti dukkhassa sa.myoge uppattikaara.nattaa ^b^dukkhasamudaya^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] tatiyasacca.m ^a^M2.0126^ea^ pana yasmaa ^b^ni^eb^-saddo abhaava.m, ^b^rodha-^eb^saddo ca caaraka.m diipeti. tasmaa abhaavo ettha sa.msaaracaarakasa"nkhaatassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisu~n~nattaa, samadhigate vaa tasmi.m sa.msaaracaarakasa"nkhaatassa dukkharodhassa abhaavo hoti, tappa.tipakkhattaatipi ^b^dukkhanirodha^eb^nti vuccati. dukkhassa vaa anuppaadanirodhapaccayattaa dukkhanirodhanti.
[03] catutthasacca.m pana yasmaa eta.m dukkhanirodha.m gacchati aaramma.navasena tadabhimukhabhuutattaa, pa.tipadaa ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyaa. tasmaa dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati vuccati.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ yasmaa panetaani buddhaadayo ariyaa pa.tivijjhanti, tasmaa ^b^ariyasaccaanii^eb^ti vuccanti. yathaaha ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaani. katamaani...pe0... imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari ariyasaccaani. ariyaa imaani pa.tivijjhanti, tasmaa ariyasaccaaniiti vuccantii''ti. apica ariyassa saccaaniitipi ariyasaccaani. yathaaha ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... manussaaya tathaagato ariyo, tasmaa ariyasaccaaniiti vuccantii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1098). atha vaa etesa.m abhisambuddhattaa ariyabhaavasiddhitopi ariyasaccaani. yathaaha -- ``imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddhattaa tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho ariyoti vuccatii''ti. apica kho pana ariyaani saccaaniitipi ariyasaccaani. ariyaaniiti tathaani avitathaani avisa.mvaadakaaniiti attho. yathaaha -- ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari ariyasaccaani tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani, tasmaa ariyasaccaaniiti vuccantii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1097) evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^lakkha.naadippabhedato^eb^? ettha hi baadhanalakkha.na.m ^b^dukkhasacca.m,^eb^ santaapanarasa.m, pavattipaccupa.t.thaana.m. pabhavalakkha.na.m ^b^samudayasacca.m,^eb^ anupacchedakara.narasa.m, palibodhapaccupa.t.thaana.m. santilakkha.na.m ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ^b^nirodhasacca.m,^eb^ accutirasa.m, animittapaccupa.t.thaana.m. niyyaanalakkha.na.m ^b^maggasacca.m,^eb^ kilesappahaanarasa.m, vu.t.thaanapaccupa.t.thaana.m. apica pavattipavattananivattinivattanalakkha.naani pa.tipaa.tiyaa. tathaa sa"nkhatata.nhaa asa"nkhatadassanalakkha.naani caati evamettha lakkha.naadippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthatthuddhaarato^eb^ ^a^M2.0127^ea^ ^b^cevaa^eb^ti ettha pana atthato taava ko sacca.t.thoti ce? yo pa~n~naacakkhunaa upaparikkhamaanaana.m maayaava vipariito, mariiciva visa.mvaadako, titthiyaana.m attaava anupalabbhasabhaavo ca na hoti, atha kho baadhanappabhavasantiniyyaanappakaarena tacchaavipariitabhuutabhaavena ariya~naa.nassa gocaro hotiyeva. esa aggilakkha.na.m viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchaavipariitabhuutabhaavo sacca.t.thoti veditabbo. yathaaha -- ``ida.m dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathameta.m avitathameta.m ana~n~nathameta''nti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1090) vitthaaro. apica --
[21] naabaadhaka.m yato dukkha.m, dukkhaa a~n~na.m na baadhaka.m.
[22] baadhakattaniyaamena, tato saccamida.m mata.m..
[21] ta.m vinaa naa~n~nato dukkha.m, na hoti na ca ta.m tato.
[22] dukkhahetuniyaamena, iti sacca.m visattikaa..
[21] naa~n~naa nibbaanato santi, santa.m na ca na ta.m yato.
[22] santabhaavaniyaamena, tato saccamida.m mata.m..
[21] maggaa a~n~na.m na niyyaana.m, aniyyaano na caapi so.
[22] tacchaniyyaanabhaavattaa, iti so saccasammato..
[21] iti tacchaavipallaasa, bhuutabhaava.m catuusvapi.
[22] dukkhaadiisvavisesena, sacca.t.tha.m aahu pa.n.ditaati..
[06] eva.m atthato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ^b^atthuddhaarato^eb^? idhaaya.m ^b^sacca-^eb^saddo anekesu atthesu dissati. seyyathida.m -- ``sacca.m bha.ne na kujjheyyaa''tiaadiisu (dha0 pa0 224) vaacaasacce. ``sacce .thitaa sama.nabraahma.naa caa''tiaadiisu (jaa0 2.21.433) viratisacce. ``kasmaa nu saccaani vadanti naanaa pavaadiyaase kusalaavadaanaa''tiaadiisu (su0 ni0 891) di.t.thisacce. ``eka.m hi sacca.m na dutiya''ntiaadiisu (su0 ni0 890) paramatthasacce nibbaane ceva magge ca. ``catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m kati kusalaa''tiaadiisu (vibha0 216) ariyasacce. svaayamidhaapi ariyasacce vattatiiti evamettha atthuddhaaratopi vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ^b^anuunaadhikato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0128^ea^ kasmaa pana cattaareva ariyasaccaani vuttaani anuunaani anadhikaaniiti ce? a~n~nassaasambhavato a~n~natarassa ca apaneyyaabhaavato. na hi etehi a~n~na.m adhika.m vaa, etesa.m vaa ekampi apanetabba.m sambhoti. yathaaha -- ``idha, bhikkhave, aagaccheyya sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa `neta.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, a~n~na.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. ahameta.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m .thapetvaa a~n~na.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''tiaadi. yathaa caaha -- ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.m vadeyya `neta.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m ya.m sama.nena gotamena desita.m, ahameta.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''tiaadi (sa.m0 ni0 5.1086).

[03] apica pavattimaacikkhanto bhagavaa sahetuka.m aacikkhi, nivatti~nca saupaaya.m. iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetuuna.m etaparamato cattaareva vuttaani. tathaa pari~n~neyyapahaatabbasacchikaatabbabhaavetabbaana.m, ta.nhaavatthuta.nhaata.nhaanirodhata.nhaanirodhupaayaana.m, aalayaaalayaaraamataaaalayasamugghaataaalayasamugghaatupaayaana~nca vasenaapi cattaareva vuttaaniiti evamettha anuunaadhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ^b^kamato^eb^ti ayampi desanaakkamova. ettha ca o.laarikattaa, sabbasattasaadhaara.nattaa ca suvi~n~neyyanti dukkhasacca.m pa.thama.m vutta.m. tasseva hetudassanattha.m tadanantara.m samudayasacca.m. hetunirodhaa phalanirodhoti ~naapanattha.m tato nirodhasacca.m. tadadhigamupaayadassanattha.m ante maggasacca.m. bhavasukhassaadagadhitaana.m vaa sattaana.m sa.mvegajananattha.m pa.thama.m dukkhamaaha. ta.m neva akata.m aagacchati ^a^V2.0125^ea^, na issaranimmaanaadito hoti, ito pana hotiiti ~naapanattha.m tadanantara.m samudaya.m. tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhuutattaa sa.mviggamaanasaana.m dukkhanissara.nagavesiina.m nissara.nadassanena assaasajananattha.m nirodha.m. tato nirodhaadhigamattha.m nirodhasampaapaka.m magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ^b^jaatiaadiina.m nicchayaa^eb^ti ye te ariyasaccaani niddisantena bhagavataa ``jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi ^a^M2.0129^ea^ vippayogo dukkho, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m, sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa''ti (vibha0 190) dukkhaniddese dvaadasa dhammaa, ``yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa nandiiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii. seyyathida.m, kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa''ti (vibha0 203) samudayaniddese tividhaa ta.nhaa, ``yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo''ti (vibha0 204) eva.m nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbaana.m, ``katama.m dukkhanirodhagaaminiipa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m, ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhii''ti (vibha0 205) eva.m magganiddese a.t.tha dhammaati iti catunna.m saccaana.m niddese jaatiaadayo dhammaa vuttaa, tesa.m jaatiaadiina.m nicchayaapi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] seyyathida.m, aya~nhi ^b^jaati^eb^-saddo anekattho. tathaa hesa ``ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo''ti (dii0 ni0 1.244; paaraa0 12) ettha bhave aagato. ``atthi, visaakhe, niga.n.thaa naama sama.najaatii''ti (a0 ni0 3.71) ettha nikaaye. ``jaati dviihi khandhehi sa"ngahitaa''ti (dhaatu0 71) ettha sa"nkhatalakkha.ne. ``ya.m maatukucchismi.m pa.thama.m citta.m uppanna.m, pa.thama.m vi~n~naa.na.m paatubhuuta.m, tadupaadaaya saavassa jaatii''ti (mahaava0 124) ettha pa.tisandhiya.m. ``sampatijaato, aananda, bodhisatto''ti (ma0 ni0 3.207) ettha pasuutiya.m. ``akkhitto anupaku.t.tho jaativaadenaa''ti (dii0 ni0 1.331) ettha kule. ``yatoha.m, bhagini, ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaato''ti (ma0 ni0 2.351) ettha ariyasiile.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ svaayamidha ^a^V2.0126^ea^ gabbhaseyyakaana.m pa.tisandhito pa.t.thaaya yaava maatukucchimhaa nikkhamana.m, taava pavattesu khandhesu. itaresa.m pa.tisandhikhandhesvevaati da.t.thabbo. ayampi ca pariyaayakathaava. nippariyaayato pana tattha tattha nibbattamaanaana.m sattaana.m ye ye khandhaa paatubhavanti, tesa.m tesa.m pa.thamapaatubhaavo jaati naama.
[03] saa ^a^M2.0130^ea^ panesaa tattha tattha bhave pa.thamaabhinibbattilakkha.naa, niyyaatanarasaa, atiitabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupa.t.thaanaa, dukkhavicittataapaccupa.t.thaanaa vaa.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ kasmaa panesaa dukkhaati ce? anekesa.m dukkhaana.m vatthubhaavato. anekaani hi dukkhaani. seyyathida.m -- dukkhadukkha.m, vipari.naamadukkha.m, sa"nkhaaradukkha.m, pa.ticchannadukkha.m, appa.ticchannadukkha.m, pariyaayadukkha.m, nippariyaayadukkhanti.
[03] tattha kaayikacetasikaa dukkhaa vedanaasabhaavato ca naamato ca dukkhattaa ^b^dukkhadukkha^eb^nti vuccati.
[03] sukhaa vedanaa vipari.naamena dukkhuppattihetuto ^b^vipari.naamadukkha.m^eb^.

[03] upekkhaa vedanaa ceva avasesaa ca tebhuumakaa sa"nkhaaraa udayabbayappa.tipii.litattaa ^b^sa"nkhaaradukkha.m^eb^. ka.n.nasuuladantasuularaagajapari.laahadosajapari.laahaadi kaayikacetasiko aabaadho pucchitvaa jaanitabbato upakkamassa ca apaaka.tabhaavato ^b^pa.ticchannadukkha.m^eb^ naama. apaaka.tadukkhantipi vuccati.
[03] dvatti.msakammakaara.naadisamu.t.thaano aabaadho apucchitvaava jaanitabbato upakkamassa ca paaka.tabhaavato ^b^appa.ticchannadukkha.m^eb^ naama. paaka.tadukkhantipi vuccati.

[03] .thapetvaa dukkhadukkha.m sesa.m dukkhasaccavibha"nge aagata.m jaatiaadi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhaavato ^b^pariyaayadukkha.m^eb^. dukkhadukkha.m pana ^b^nippariyaayadukkha^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] tatraaya.m ^a^V2.0127^ea^ jaati ya.m ta.m baalapa.n.ditasuttaadiisu (ma0 ni0 3.246 aadayo) bhagavataapi upamaavasena pakaasita.m aapaayika.m dukkha.m, ya~nca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimuulakaadibheda.m dukkha.m uppajjati, tassa vatthubhaavato dukkhaa.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ tatrida.m gabbhokkantimuulakaadibheda.m dukkha.m -- aya.m hi satto maatukucchimhi nibbattamaano na uppalapadumapu.n.dariikaadiisu nibbattati, atha kho he.t.thaa aamaasayassa upari pakkaasayassa udarapa.talapi.t.thika.n.takaana.m vemajjhe paramasambaadhe tibbandhakaarenaanaaku.napagandhaparibhaavitaparamaduggandhapavanavicarite adhimattajegucche kucchipadese puutimacchapuutikummaasacandanikaadiisu kimi viya nibbattati. so tattha nibbatto dasa maase maatukucchisambhavena usmanaa pu.tapaaka.m viya paccamaano pi.t.thapi.n.di viya sediyamaano sami~njanapasaara.naadirahito adhimatta.m dukkhamanubhotiiti, ida.m taava ^b^gabbhokkantimuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m.

[03] ya.m ^a^M2.0131^ea^ pana so maatu sahasaa upakkhalanagamananisiidanavu.t.thaanaparivattanaadiisu suraadhuttahatthagato e.lako viya ahitu.n.dikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca aaka.d.dhanaparika.d.dhanaodhuunananiddhuunanaadinaa upakkamena adhimatta.m dukkhamanubhavati, ya~nca maatu siituudakapaanakaale siitanarakupapanno viya, u.nhayaagubhattaadiajjhohara.nakaale a"ngaaravu.t.thisampariki.n.no viya, lo.nambilaadiajjhohara.nakaale khaaraapa.ticchakaadikammakaara.napatto viya tibba.m dukkhamanubhoti, ida.m ^b^gabbhaparihara.namuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m.
[03] ya.m panassa muu.lhagabbhaaya maatuyaa mittaamaccasuhajjaadiihipi adassanaarahe dukkhuppatti.t.thaane chedanaphaalanaadiihi dukkha.m uppajjati, ida.m ^b^gabbhavipattimuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m.

[03] ya.m vijaayamaanaaya maatuyaa kammajehi vaatehi parivattetvaa narakapapaata.m viya atibhayaanaka.m yonimagga.m pa.tipaatiyamaanassa paramasambaadhena yonimukhena taa.lacchigga.lena viya nikka.d.dhiyamaanassa mahaanaagassa narakasattassa viya ca sa"nghaatapabbatehi vicu.n.niyamaanassa dukkha.m uppajjati, ida.m ^b^vijaayanamuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m.

[03] ya.m pana jaatassa taru.nava.nasadisasukhumaalasariirassa hatthagaha.nanahaapanadhovanaco.laparimajjanaadikaale ^a^V2.0128^ea^ suucimukhakhuradhaaraahi vijjhanaphaalanasadisa.m dukkha.m uppajjati, ida.m maatukucchito ^b^bahinikkhamanamuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m.

[03] ya.m tato para.m pavattiya.m attanaava attaana.m vadhentassa acelakavataadivasena aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyuttassa, kodhavasena abhu~njantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkha.m uppajjati, ida.m ^b^attuupakkamamuulaka.m^eb^ dukkha.m. ya.m pana parato vadhabandhanaadiini anubhavantassa uppajjati, ida.m ^b^paruupakkamamuulaka.m^eb^ dukkhanti.
[03] iti imassa sabbassaapi dukkhassa aya.m jaati vatthumeva hoti.
[03] 541^b^.^eb^ teneta.m vuccati --
[21] jaayetha no ce narakesu satto,
[27] tattaggidaahaadikamappasayha.m.
[26] labhetha dukkha.m nu kuhi.m pati.t.tha.m,
[22] iccaaha dukkhaati muniidha jaati.m..
[21] dukkha.m ^a^M2.0132^ea^ tiracchesu kasaapatoda-
[27] da.n.daabhighaataadibhava.m aneka.m.
[26] ya.m ta.m katha.m tattha bhaveyya jaati.m,
[22] vinaa tahi.m jaati tatopi dukkhaa..
[21] petesu dukkha.m pana khuppipaasaa-
[27] vaataatapaadippabhava.m vicitta.m.
[26] yasmaa ajaatassa na tattha atthi,
[22] tasmaapi dukkha.m muni jaatimaaha..
[21] tibbandhakaare ^a^V2.0129^ea^ ca asayhasiite,

[22] yato aya.m jaati tatopi dukkhaa..

[27] satto vasa.m ciramato bahi nikkhama~nca.

[22] jaati.m vinaa itipi jaati aya~nhi dukkhaa..

[22] dukkhaati sabbapa.thama.m imamaaha jaatinti..

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ^b^jaraapi dukkhaa^eb^ti ettha duvidhaa jaraa sa"nkhatalakkha.na~nca, kha.n.diccaadisammato santatiya.m ekabhavapariyaapannakhandhapuraa.nabhaavo ca, saa idha adhippetaa. saa panesaa jaraa khandhaparipaakalakkha.naa, mara.nuupanayanarasaa, yobbanavinaasapaccupa.t.thaanaa. dukkhaa sa"nkhaaradukkhabhaavato ceva dukkhavatthuto ca ^a^M2.0133^ea^. ya.m hi a"ngapacca"ngasithiliibhaavaindriyavikaaraviruupataayobbanavinaasabaluupaghaatasatimativippavaasaparaparibhavaadianekapaccaya.m kaayikacetasikadukkha.m uppajjati, jaraa tassa vatthu. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``a"ngaana.m sithiliibhaavaa, indriyaana.m vikaarato.
[22] yobbanassa vinaasena, balassa upaghaatato..
[21] ``vippavaasaa ^a^V2.0130^ea^ sataadiina.m, puttadaarehi attano.
[22] apasaadaniiyato ceva, bhiyyo baalattapattiyaa..
[21] ``pappoti dukkha.m ya.m macco, kaayika.m maanasa.m tathaa.
[22] sabbameta.m jaraahetu, yasmaa tasmaa jaraa dukhaa''ti..
[06] aya.m jaraaya.m vinicchayo.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ^b^mara.nampi dukkha^eb^nti etthaapi duvidha.m mara.na.m sa"nkhatalakkha.na~nca, ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``jaraamara.na.m dviihi khandhehi sa"ngahita''nti (dhaatu0 71). ekabhavapariyaapannajiivitindriyappabandhavicchedo ca, ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``nicca.m mara.nato bhaya''nti (su0 ni0 581). ta.m idha adhippeta.m. jaatipaccayaa mara.na.m upakkamamara.na.m sarasamara.na.m aayukkhayamara.na.m pu~n~nakkhayamara.nantipi tasseva naama.m. tayida.m cutilakkha.na.m, viyogarasa.m, gativippavaasapaccupa.t.thaana.m. dukkhassa pana vatthubhaavato dukkhanti veditabba.m. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``paapassa paapakammaadi-nimittamanupassato.
[27] bhaddassaapasahantassa, viyoga.m piyavatthuka.m.
[22] miiyamaanassa ya.m dukkha.m, maanasa.m avisesato..
[21] sabbesa~ncaapi ya.m sandhi-bandhanacchedanaadika.m.
[22] vitujjamaanamammaana.m, hoti dukkha.m sariiraja.m..
[21] asayhamappatikaara.m, dukkhassetassida.m yato.
[22] mara.na.m vatthu teneta.m, dukkhamicceva bhaasita''nti..
[06] aya.m mara.ne vinicchayo.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ sokaadiisu ^a^M2.0134^ea^ ^a^V2.0131^ea^ ^b^soko^eb^ naama ~naatibyasanaadiihi phu.t.thassa cittasantaapo. so ki~ncaapi atthato domanassameva hoti. eva.m santepi antonijjhaanalakkha.no, cetaso parijjhaapanaraso, anusocanapaccupa.t.thaano. dukkho pana dukkhadukkhato dukkhavatthuto ca. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``sattaana.m hadaya.m soko, visasalla.mva tujjati.
[22] aggitattova naaraaco, bhusa.mva dahate puna..
[21] ``samaavahati ca byaadhi-jaraamara.nabhedana.m.
[22] dukkhampi vividha.m yasmaa, tasmaa dukkhoti vuccatii''ti..
[06] aya.m soke vinicchayo.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ^b^paridevo^eb^ naama ~naatibyasanaadiihi phu.t.thassa vaciipalaapo. so laalappanalakkha.no, gu.nadosakittanaraso, sambhamapaccupa.t.thaano. dukkho pana sa"nkhaaradukkhabhaavato dukkhavatthuto ca. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``ya.m sokasallavihato paridevamaano,
[27] ka.n.tho.t.thataalutalasosajamappasayha.m.
[26] bhiyyodhimattamadhigacchatiyeva dukkha.m,
[22] dukkhoti tena bhagavaa paridevamaahaa''ti..
[06] aya.m parideve vinicchayo.

[03] 546^b^.^eb^ ^b^dukkha.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0132^ea^ naama kaayika.m dukkha.m, ta.m kaayapii.lanalakkha.na.m, duppa~n~naana.m domanassakara.narasa.m, kaayikaabaadhapaccupa.t.thaana.m. dukkha.m pana dukkhadukkhato maanasadukkhaavahanato ca. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``pii.leti kaayikamida.m, dukkha~nca maanasa.m bhiyyo.
[22] janayati yasmaa tasmaa, dukkhanti visesato vutta''nti..
[06] aya.m dukkhe vinicchayo.

[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ^b^domanassa.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0135^ea^ naama maanasa.m dukkha.m. ta.m cittapii.lanalakkha.na.m, manovighaatarasa.m, maanasabyaadhipaccupa.t.thaana.m. dukkha.m pana dukkhadukkhato kaayikadukkhaavahanato ca. cetodukkhasamappitaa hi kese pakiriya kandanti, uraani pa.tipisanti, aava.t.tanti, viva.t.tanti, uddha.mpaada.m papatanti, sattha.m aaharanti, visa.m khaadanti, rajjuyaa ubbandhanti, aggi.m pavisantiiti ta.m naanappakaaraka.m dukkhamanubhavanti. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``pii.leti yato citta.m, kaayassa ca pii.lana.m samaavahati.
[22] dukkhanti domanassa.m, vidomanassaa tato aahuu''ti..
[06] aya.m domanasse vinicchayo.

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ^b^upaayaaso^eb^ naama ~naatibyasanaadiihi phu.t.thassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhaavito dosoyeva. ^b^sa"nkhaarakkhandhapariyaapanno eko dhammoti eke^eb^. so cittaparidahanalakkha.no, nitthunanaraso ^a^V2.0133^ea^, visaadapaccupa.t.thaano. dukkho pana sa"nkhaaradukkhabhaavato cittaparidahanato kaayavisaadanato ca. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``cittassa ca paridahanaa, kaayassa visaadanaa ca adhimatta.m.
[22] ya.m dukkhamupaayaaso, janeti dukkho tato vutto''ti..
[06] aya.m upaayaase vinicchayo.

[03] ettha ca mandagginaa antobhaajane paako viya ^b^soko^eb^. tikkhagginaa paccamaanassa bhaajanato bahinikkhamana.m viya ^b^paridevo^eb^. bahinikkhantaavasesassa nikkhamitu.m appahontassa antobhaajaneyeva yaava parikkhayaa paako viya ^b^upaayaaso^eb^ da.t.thabbo.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ^b^appiyasampayogo^eb^ naama amanaapehi sattasa"nkhaarehi samodhaana.m. so ani.t.thasamodhaanalakkha.no, cittavighaatakara.naraso, anatthabhaavapaccupa.t.thaano. dukkho pana dukkhavatthuto. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``disvaava ^a^M2.0136^ea^ appiye dukkha.m, pa.thama.m hoti cetasi.
[22] tadupakkamasambhuuta-mathakaaye yato idha..
[21] ``tato dukkhadvayassaapi, vatthuto so mahesinaa.
[22] dukkho vuttoti vi~n~neyyo, appiyehi samaagamo''ti..
[06] aya.m appiyasampayoge vinicchayo.

[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ^b^piyavippayogo^eb^ naama manaapehi sattasa"nkhaarehi vinaabhaavo. so i.t.thavatthuviyogalakkha.no ^a^V2.0134^ea^, sokuppaadanaraso, byasanapaccupa.t.thaano. dukkho pana sokadukkhassa vatthuto. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``~naatidhanaadiviyogaa,
[27] sokasarasamappitaa vitujjanti.
[26] baalaa yato tato ya.m,
[22] dukkhoti mato piyavippayogo''ti..
[06] aya.m piyavippayoge vinicchayo.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ ^b^yampiccha.m na labhatii^eb^ti ettha ``aho vata maya.m na jaatidhammaa assaamaa''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 2.398; vibha0 201) alabbhaneyyavatthuusu icchaava yampiccha.m na labhati, tampi dukkhanti vuttaa. saa alabbhaneyyavatthuicchanalakkha.naa, tappariyesanarasaa, tesa.m appattipaccupa.t.thaanaa. dukkhaa pana dukkhavatthuto. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``ta.m ta.m patthayamaanaana.m, tassa tassa alaabhato.
[22] ya.m vighaatamaya.m dukkha.m, sattaana.m idha jaayati..
[21] ``alabbhaneyyavatthuuna.m, patthanaa tassa kaara.na.m.
[22] yasmaa tasmaa jino dukkha.m, icchitaalaabhamabravii''ti..
[06] aya.m icchitaalaabhe vinicchayo.
[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa.mkhittena^eb^ ^a^M2.0137^ea^ ^b^pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa^eb^ti ettha pana --
[21] jaatippabhutika.m ^a^V2.0135^ea^ dukkha.m, ya.m vuttamidha taadinaa.
[22] avutta.m ya~nca ta.m sabba.m, vinaa ete na vijjati..
[21] yasmaa tasmaa upaadaana-kkhandhaa sa"nkhepato ime.
[22] dukkhaati vuttaa dukkhanta-desakena mahesinaa..

[03] tathaa hi indhanamiva paavako, lakkhamiva pahara.naani, goruupa.m viya .da.msamakasaadayo, khettamiva laayakaa, gaama.m viya gaamaghaatakaa upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncakameva jaatiaadayo naanappakaarehi vibaadhentaa ti.nalataadiini viya bhuumiya.m, pupphaphalapallavaani viya rukkhesu upaadaanakkhandhesuyeva nibbattanti. upaadaanakkhandhaana~nca aadidukkha.m jaati, majjhedukkha.m jaraa, pariyosaanadukkha.m mara.na.m, maara.nantikadukkhaabhighaatena pari.dayhanadukkha.m soko, tadasahanato laalappanadukkha.m paridevo, tato dhaatukkhobhasa"nkhaataani.t.thapho.t.thabbasamaayogato kaayassa aabaadhanadukkha.m dukkha.m, tena baadhiyamaanaana.m puthujjanaana.m tattha pa.tighuppattito cetobaadhanadukkha.m domanassa.m, sokaadivuddhiyaa janitavisaadaana.m anutthunanadukkha.m upaayaaso, manorathavighaatappattaana.m icchaavighaatadukkha.m icchitaalaabhoti eva.m naanappakaarato upaparikkhiyamaanaa upaadaanakkhandhaava dukkhaati. yadeta.m ekameka.m dassetvaa vuccamaana.m anekehipi kappehi na sakkaa asesato vattu.m, tasmaa ta.m sabbampi dukkha.m ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasa.m viya yesu kesuci pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu sa.mkhipitvaa dassetu.m ``sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa''ti bhagavaa avocaati. aya.m upaadaanakkhandhesu vinicchayo.
[06] aya.m taava dukkhaniddese nayo.

[03] 553^b^.^eb^ samudayaniddese pana ^b^yaaya.m ta.nhaa^eb^ti yaa aya.m ta.nhaa. ^b^ponobbhavikaa^eb^ti punabbhavakara.na.m punobbhavo, punobbhavo siilametissaati ^a^M2.0138^ea^ ponobbhavikaa. ^b^nandiiraagena sahagataa^eb^ti nandiiraagasahagataa, nandiiraagena saddhi.m atthato ekattameva gataati vutta.m hoti. ^b^tatra tatraabhinandinii^eb^ti yatra yatra attabhaavo nibbattati, tatra tatraabhinandinii. ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti nipaato ^a^V2.0136^ea^, tassa saa katamaati ceti attho. kaamata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaati imaa pa.ticcasamuppaadaniddese aavibhavissanti. idha panaaya.m tividhaapi dukkhasaccassa nibbattaka.t.thena ekatta.m upanetvaa dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasaccanti vuttaati veditabbaa.
[06] aya.m samudayaniddese nayo.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassaayeva ta.nhaayaatiaadinaa nayena samudayanirodho vutto, so kasmaati ce? samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho. samudayanirodhena hi dukkha.m nirujjhati, na a~n~nathaa. tenaaha --
[21] ``yathaapi muule anupaddave da.lhe,
[27] chinnopi rukkho punadeva ruuhati.
[26] evampi ta.nhaanusaye anuuhate,
[22] nibbattatii dukkhamida.m punappuna''nti.. (dha0 pa0 338).

[03] iti yasmaa samudayanirodheneva dukkha.m nirujjhati, tasmaa bhagavaa dukkhanirodha.m desento samudayanirodheneva desesi. siihasamaanavuttino hi tathaagataa. te dukkha.m nirodhentaa dukkhanirodha~nca desentaa hetumhi pa.tipajjanti, na phale. suvaanavuttino pana titthiyaa. te dukkha.m nirodhentaa dukkhanirodha~nca desentaa attakilamathaanuyogadesanaadiihi phale pa.tipajjanti, na hetumhiiti. eva.m taava dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanaaya payojana.m veditabba.m.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ aya.m panattho -- ^b^tassaayeva ta.nhaayaa^eb^ti tassaa ``ponobbhavikaa''ti vatvaa kaamata.nhaadivasena vibhattata.nhaaya. ^b^viraago^eb^ vuccati maggo. ``viraagaa vimuccatii''ti (ma0 ni0 1.245; sa.m0 ni0 3.14) hi vutta.m. viraagena nirodho viraaganirodho. anusayasamugghaatato aseso viraaganirodho ^b^asesaviraaganirodho^eb^. atha vaa ^b^viraago^eb^ti pahaana.m vuccati, tasmaa aseso ^a^M2.0139^ea^ viraago aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanaa da.t.thabbaa. atthato pana sabbaaneva ^a^V2.0137^ea^ etaani nibbaanassa vevacanaani. paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbaana.m vuccati. yasmaa pana ta.m aagamma ta.nhaa virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, tasmaa viraagoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati. yasmaa ca tadeva aagamma tassaa caagaadayo honti, kaamagu.naalayesu cettha ekopi aalayo natthi, tasmaa ``caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo''ti vuccati.
[03] 556^b^.^eb^ tayida.m santilakkha.na.m, accutirasa.m, assaasakara.narasa.m vaa, animittapaccupa.t.thaana.m, nippapa~ncapaccupa.t.thaana.m vaa.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ nattheva nibbaana.m, sasavisaa.na.m viya anupalabbhaniiyatoti ce? na, upaayena upalabbhaniiyato. upalabbhati hi ta.m tadanuruupapa.tipattisa"nkhaatena upaayena, cetopariya~naa.nena paresa.m lokuttaracitta.m viya, tasmaa ``anupalabbhaniiyato natthii''ti na vattabba.m. na hi ``ya.m baalaputhujjanaa na upalabhanti, ta.m natthii''ti vattabba.m.

[03] 558^b^.^eb^ apica nibbaana.m natthiiti na vattabba.m, kasmaa? pa.tipattiyaa va~njhabhaavaapajjanato. asati hi nibbaane sammaadi.t.thipurejavaaya siilaadikhandhattayasa"ngahaaya sammaapa.tipattiyaa va~njhabhaavo aapajjati. na caaya.m va~njhaa, nibbaanapaapanatoti. na pa.tipattiyaa va~njhabhaavaapatti, abhaavapaapakattaati ce. na, atiitaanaagataabhaavepi nibbaanapattiyaa abhaavato. vattamaanaanampi abhaavo nibbaananti ce. na, tesa.m abhaavaasambhavato, abhaave ca avattamaanabhaavaapajjanato, vattamaanakkhandhanissitamaggakkha.ne ca sopaadisesanibbaanadhaatuppattiyaa abhaavadosato. tadaa kilesaana.m avattamaanattaa na dosoti ce. na, ariyamaggassa niratthakabhaavaapajjanato. eva~nhi sati ariyamaggakkha.nato pubbepi kilesaa na santiiti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhaavo aapajjati. tasmaa akaara.nameta.m.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ``yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo''tiaadivacanato (sa.m0 ni0 4.315) ``khayo nibbaana''nti ce. na, arahattassaapi khayamattaapajjanato. tampi hi ^a^M2.0140^ea^ ``yo kho, aavuso ^a^V2.0138^ea^, raagakkhayo''tiaadinaa (sa0 ni0 4.315) nayena niddi.t.tha.m. ki~nca bhiyyo nibbaanassa ittarakaalaadippattidosato. eva~nhi sati nibbaana.m ittarakaala.m, sa"nkhatalakkha.na.m, sammaavaayaamanirapekkhaadhigamaniiyabhaava~nca aapajjati. sa"nkhatalakkha.nattaayeva ca sa"nkhatapariyaapanna.m, sa"nkhatapariyaapannattaa raagaadiihi aggiihi aaditta.m, aadittattaa dukkha~ncaatipi aapajjati. yasmaa khayaa pa.t.thaaya na bhiyyo pavatti naama hoti, tassa nibbaanabhaavato na dosoti ce. na, taadisassa khayassa abhaavato. bhaavepi cassa vuttappakaaradosaanativattanato, ariyamaggassa ca nibbaanabhaavaapajjanato. ariyamaggo hi dose khii.neti, tasmaa khayoti vuccati. tato ca pa.t.thaaya na bhiyyo dosaana.m pavattiiti.

[01] anuppattinirodhasa"nkhaatassa pana khayassa pariyaayena upanissayattaa, yassa upanissayo hoti tadupacaarena ``khayo''ti vutta.m. saruupeneva kasmaa na vuttanti ce. atisukhumattaa. atisukhumataa cassa bhagavato apposukkabhaavaavahanato, ariyena cakkhunaa passitabbato ca siddhaati.

[03] 560^b^.^eb^ tayida.m maggasama"nginaa pattabbato ^b^asaadhaara.na.m,^eb^ purimako.tiyaa abhaavato ^b^appabhava.m^eb^. maggabhaave bhaavato na appabhavanti ce. na, maggena anuppaadaniiyato. pattabbameva heta.m maggena, na uppaadetabba.m. tasmaa appabhavameva. appabhavattaa ^b^ajaraamara.na.m^eb^. pabhavajaraamara.naana.m abhaavato ^b^nicca.m^eb^.

[03] nibbaanasseva a.nuaadiinampi niccabhaavaapattiiti ce. na, hetuno abhaavaa. nibbaanassa niccattaa te niccaati ce. na, hetulakkha.nassa anupapattito. niccaa uppaadaadiina.m abhaavato nibbaana.m viyaati ce. na, a.nuaadiina.m asiddhattaa.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ yathaavuttayuttisabbhaavato pana idameva nicca.m, ruupasabhaavaatikkamato ^b^aruupa.m^eb^. buddhaadiina.m ni.t.thaaya visesaabhaavato ^b^ekaava ni.t.thaa^eb^. yena bhaavanaaya patta.m, tassa kilesavuupasama.m, upaadisesa~nca upaadaaya pa~n~naapaniiyattaa saha upaadisesena pa~n~naapiyatiiti ^b^saupaadisesa.m^eb^. yo cassa samudayappahaanena upahataayatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddha.m pavattikhandhaana.m anuppaadanato, uppannaana~nca antaradhaanato upaadisesaabhaavo ^a^M2.0141^ea^, ta.m upaadaaya pa~n~naapaniiyato natthi ettha upaadisesoti ^b^anupaadisesa.m^eb^.

[03] asithilaparakkamasiddhena ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ~naa.navisesena adhigamaniiyato, sabba~n~nuvacanato ca paramatthena sabhaavato nibbaana.m naavijjamaana.m. vutta~nheta.m ``atthi, bhikkhave, ajaata.m abhuuta.m akata.m asa"nkhata''nti.
[06] ida.m dukkhanirodhaniddese vinicchayakathaamukha.m.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ dukkhanirodhagaaminipa.tipadaaniddese vuttaa pana a.t.tha dhammaa kaama.m khandhaniddesepi atthato pakaasitaayeva, idha pana nesa.m ekakkha.ne pavattamaanaana.m visesaavabodhanattha.m vadaama. sa"nkhepato hi catusaccapa.tivedhaaya pa.tipannassa yogino nibbaanaaramma.na.m avijjaanusayasamugghaataka.m pa~n~naacakkhu ^b^sammaadi.t.thi^eb^. saa sammaa dassanalakkha.naa, dhaatuppakaasanarasaa, avijjandhakaaraviddha.msanapaccupa.t.thaanaa. tathaa sampannadi.t.thino ta.msampayutta.m micchaasa"nkappanighaataka.m cetaso nibbaanapadaabhiniropana.m ^b^sammaasa"nkappo^eb^. so sammaa cittaabhiniropanalakkha.no, appanaaraso, micchaasa"nkappappahaanapaccupa.t.thaano.

[03] tathaa passato vitakkayato ca ta.msampayuttaava vaciiduccaritasamugghaatikaa micchaavaacaaya virati ^b^sammaavaacaa^eb^ naama. saa pariggahalakkha.naa, virama.narasaa, micchaavaacaappahaanapaccupa.t.thaanaa. tathaa viramato ta.msampayuttaava micchaakammantasamucchedikaa paa.naatipaataadivirati ^b^sammaakammanto^eb^ naama. so samu.t.thaapanalakkha.no, virama.naraso, micchaakammantappahaanapaccupa.t.thaano. yaa panassa tesa.m sammaavaacaakammantaana.m visuddhibhuutaa ta.msampayuttaava kuhanaadiupacchedikaa micchaajiivavirati, so ^b^sammaaaajiivo^eb^ naama. so vodaanalakkha.no, ~naayaajiivapavattiraso, micchaajiivappahaanapaccupa.t.thaano.

[03] athassa yo tassaa sammaavaacaakammantaajiivasa"nkhaataaya siilabhuumiya.m pati.t.thitassa tadanuruupo ta.msampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako viiriyaarambho, esa ^b^sammaavaayaamo^eb^ naama. so paggahalakkha.no, anuppannaakusalaanuppaadanaadiraso, micchaavaayaamappahaanapaccupa.t.thaano. tasseva.m vaayamato ta.msampayuttova micchaasativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso ^a^M2.0142^ea^ ^b^sammaasati^eb^ naama. saa upa.t.thaanalakkha.naa, asammussanarasaa, micchaasatippahaanapaccupa.t.thaanaa. eva.m anuttaraaya satiyaa sa.mrakkhiyamaanacittassa ^a^V2.0140^ea^ ta.msampayuttaava micchaasamaadhividdha.msikaa cittekaggataa ^b^sammaasamaadhi^eb^ naama. so avikkhepalakkha.no, samaadhaanaraso, micchaasamaadhippahaanapaccupa.t.thaanoti. aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminipa.tipadaaniddese nayo. evamettha jaatiaadiina.m vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ^b^~naa.nakiccato^eb^ti sacca~naa.nassa kiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo. duvidha.m hi sacca~naa.na.m -- anubodha~naa.na.m pa.tivedha~naa.na~nca. tattha anubodha~naa.na.m lokiya.m anussavaadivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati. pa.tivedha~naa.na.m lokuttara.m nirodhamaaramma.na.m katvaa kiccato cattaari saccaani pa.tivijjhati. yathaaha -- ``yo, bhikkhave, dukkha.m passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipadampi passatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1100) sabba.m vattabba.m. ta.m panassa kicca.m ~naa.nadassanavisuddhiya.m aavibhavissati.

[03] ya.m paneta.m lokiya.m, tattha dukkha~naa.na.m pariyu.t.thaanaabhibhavavasena pavattamaana.m sakkaayadi.t.thi.m nivatteti. samudaya~naa.na.m ucchedadi.t.thi.m. nirodha~naa.na.m sassatadi.t.thi.m. magga~naa.na.m akiriyadi.t.thi.m. dukkha~naa.na.m vaa dhuvasubhasukhattabhaavavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhaavasa~n~naasa"nkhaata.m phale vippa.tipatti.m. samudaya~naa.na.m issarapadhaanakaalasabhaavaadiihi loko pavattatiiti akaara.ne kaara.naabhimaanappavatta.m hetumhi vippa.tipatti.m. nirodha~naa.na.m aruupalokalokathuupikaadiisu apavaggagaahabhuuta.m nirodhe vippa.tipatti.m. magga~naa.na.m kaamasukhallikaattakilamathaanuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagaahavasena pavatta.m upaaye vippa.tipatti.m nivatteti. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupaaye.
[22] sammuyhati taava naro, na vijaanaati yaava saccaanii''ti..
[03] evamettha ~naa.nakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ ^b^antogadhaana.m pabhedaa^eb^ti dukkhasaccasmi.m hi .thapetvaa ta.nha~nceva anaasavadhamme ca sesaa sabbadhammaa antogadhaa. samudayasacce chatti.msa ta.nhaavicaritaani. nirodhasacca.m asammissa.m. maggasacce sammaadi.t.thimukhena viima.msiddhipaadapa~n~nindriyapa~n~naabaladhammavicayasambojjha"ngaani. sammaasa"nkappaapadesena tayo ^a^M2.0143^ea^ nekkhammavitakkaadayo. sammaavaacaapadesena cattaari vaciisucaritaani ^a^V2.0141^ea^. sammaakammantaapadesena tii.ni kaayasucaritaani. sammaajiivamukhena appicchataa santu.t.thitaa ca. sabbesa.myeva vaa etesa.m sammaavaacaakammantaajiivaana.m ariyakantasiilattaa ariyakantasiilassa ca saddhaahatthena pa.tiggahetabbattaa tesa.m atthitaaya atthibhaavato saddhindriyasaddhaabalachandiddhipaadaa. sammaavaayaamaapadesena catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyindriyaviiriyabalaviiriyasambojjha"ngaani. sammaasatiapadesena catubbidhasatipa.t.thaanasatindriyasatibalasatisambojjha"ngaani. sammaasamaadhiapadesena savitakkasavicaaraadayo tayo samaadhii cittasamaadhi samaadhindriyasamaadhibalapiitipassaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasambojjha"ngaani antogadhaaniiti evamettha antogadhaana.m pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 565^b^.^eb^ ^b^upamaato^eb^ti bhaaro viya hi dukkhasacca.m da.t.thabba.m, bhaaraadaanamiva samudayasacca.m, bhaaranikkhepanamiva nirodhasacca.m, bhaaranikkhepanupaayo viya maggasacca.m. rogo viya ca dukkhasacca.m, roganidaanamiva samudayasacca.m, rogavuupasamo viya nirodhasacca.m, bhesajjamiva maggasacca.m. dubbhikkhamiva vaa dukkhasacca.m, dubbu.t.thi viya samudayasacca.m, subhikkhamiva nirodhasacca.m, suvu.t.thi viya maggasacca.m. apica verii-veramuula-verasamugghaata-verasamugghaatupaayehi, visarukkha-rukkhamuula-muulupaccheda-tadupacchedupaayehi, bhaya-bhayamuula-nibbhaya-tadadhigamupaayehi, orimatiira-mahoghapaarimatiira-ta.msampaapakavaayaamehi ca yojetvaapetaani upamaato veditabbaaniiti evamettha upamaato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ^b^catukkato^eb^ti atthi cettha dukkha.m na ariyasacca.m, atthi ariyasacca.m na dukkha.m, atthi dukkha~nceva ariyasacca~nca, atthi neva dukkha.m na ariyasacca.m. esa nayo samudayaadiisu. tattha maggasampayuttaa dhammaa saama~n~naphalaani ca ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha''nti (sa.m0 ni0 3.15) vacanato sa"nkhaaradukkhataaya dukkha.m, na ariyasacca.m. nirodho ariyasacca.m, na dukkha.m. itara.m pana ariyasaccadvaya.m siyaa dukkha.m aniccato, na pana yassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati tathattena. sabbaakaarena pana upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncaka.m dukkha~nceva ariyasacca~nca a~n~natra ta.nhaaya. maggasampayuttaa dhammaa saama~n~naphalaani ca yassa pari~n~nattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati tathattena neva dukkha.m na ariyasacca.m. eva.m samudayaadiisupi yathaayoga.m yojetvaa catukkatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 567^b^.^eb^ su~n~natekavidhaadiihiitiettha ^a^M2.0144^ea^ ^a^V2.0142^ea^ ^b^su~n~nato^eb^ taava paramatthena hi sabbaaneva saccaani vedakakaarakanibbutagamakaabhaavato su~n~naaniiti veditabbaani. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``dukkhameva hi, na koci dukkhito.
[27] kaarako na, kiriyaava vijjati..
[26] atthi nibbuti, na nibbuto pumaa.
[22] maggamatthi, gamako na vijjatii''ti..
[03] atha vaa,
[21] dhuvasubhasukhattasu~n~na.m, purimadvayamattasu~n~namamatapada.m.
[22] dhuvasukhaattavirahito, maggoiti su~n~nataa tesu..

[03] nirodhasu~n~naani vaa tii.ni, nirodho ca sesattayasu~n~no. phalasu~n~no vaa ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassaabhaavato, magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativaadiina.m pakati viya. hetusu~n~na~nca phala.m dukkhasamudayaana.m nirodhamaggaana~nca asamavaayaa, na hetusamaveta.m hetuphala.m samavaayavaadiina.m dvia.nukaadi viya. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``tayamidha nirodhasu~n~na.m, tayena tenaapi nibbuti su~n~naa.
[22] su~n~no phalena hetu, phalampi ta.mhetunaa su~n~na''nti..
[06] eva.m taava su~n~nato vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] 568^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekavidhaadiihii^eb^ti sabbameva cettha dukkha.m ekavidha.m pavattibhaavato. duvidha.m naamaruupato. tividha.m kaamaruupaaruupuupapattibhavabhedato. catubbidha.m catuaahaarabhedato. pa~ncavidha.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhabhedato.

[03] samudayopi ^a^V2.0143^ea^ ekavidho pavattakabhaavato. duvidho di.t.thisampayuttaasampayuttato. tividho kaamabhavavibhavata.nhaabhedato. catubbidho catumaggappaheyyato. pa~ncavidho ruupaabhinandanaadibhedato. chabbidho chata.nhaakaayabhedato.

[03] nirodhopi ^a^M2.0145^ea^ ekavidho asa"nkhatadhaatubhaavato. pariyaayena pana duvidho saupaadisesaanupaadisesabhedato. tividho bhavattayavuupasamato. catubbidho catumaggaadhigamaniiyato. pa~ncavidho pa~ncaabhinandanavuupasamato. chabbidho chata.nhaakaayakkhayabhedato.

[03] maggopi ekavidho bhaavetabbato. duvidho samathavipassanaabhedato, dassanabhaavanaabhedato vaa. tividho khandhattayabhedato. aya~nhi sappadesattaa nagara.m viya rajjena nippadesehi tiihi khandhehi sa"ngahito. yathaaha --

[02] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena tayo khandhaa sa"ngahitaa, tiihi ca kho, aavuso visaakha, khandhehi ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"ngahito. yaa caavuso visaakha, sammaavaacaa, yo ca sammaakammanto, yo ca sammaaaajiivo, ime dhammaa siilakkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yo ca sammaavaayaamo, yaa ca sammaasati, yo ca sammaasamaadhi, ime dhammaa samaadhikkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yaa ca sammaadi.t.thi, yo ca sammaasa"nkappo, ime dhammaa pa~n~naakkhandhe sa"ngahitaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.462).

[03] ettha hi sammaavaacaadayo tayo siilameva, tasmaa te sajaatito siilakkhandhena sa"ngahitaa. ki~ncaapi hi paa.liya.m siilakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana kara.navaseneva veditabbo. sammaavaayaamaadiisu pana tiisu samaadhi attano dhammataaya aaramma.ne ekaggabhaavena appetu.m na sakkoti, viiriye pana paggahakicca.m saadhente satiyaa ca apilaapanakicca.m saadhentiyaa laddhupakaaro hutvaa sakkoti.

[01] tatraaya.m upamaa -- yathaa hi nakkhatta.m kii.lissaamaati uyyaana.m pavi.t.thesu tiisu sahaayesu eko supupphita.m campakarukkha.m disvaa hattha.m ukkhipitvaa gahetumpi na sakku.neyya. athassa dutiyo onamitvaa ^a^V2.0144^ea^ pi.t.thi.m dadeyya, so tassa pi.t.thiya.m .thatvaapi kampamaano gahetu.m na sakku.neyya. athassa itaro a.msakuu.ta.m upanaameyya. so ekassa pi.t.thiya.m .thatvaa ekassa a.msakuu.ta.m olubbha yathaaruci pupphaani ocinitvaa pi.landhitvaa nakkhatta.m kii.leyya. eva.msampadamida.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ekato ^a^M2.0146^ea^ uyyaana.m pavi.t.thaa tayo sahaayaa viya hi ekato jaataa sammaavaayaamaadayo tayo dhammaa. supupphitacampako viya aaramma.na.m. hattha.m ukkhipitvaapi gahetu.m asakkonto viya attano dhammataaya aaramma.ne ekaggabhaavena appetu.m asakkonto samaadhi. pi.t.thi.m datvaa onatasahaayo viya vaayaamo. a.msakuu.ta.m datvaa .thitasahaayo viya sati. yathaa tesu ekassa pi.t.thiya.m .thatvaa ekassa a.msakuu.ta.m olubbha itaro yathaaruci puppha.m gahetu.m sakkoti, evameva viiriye paggahakicca.m saadhente satiyaa ca apilaapanakicca.m saadhentiyaa laddhupakaaro samaadhi sakkoti aaramma.ne ekaggabhaavena appetu.m. tasmaa samaadhiyevettha sajaatito samaadhikkhandhena sa"ngahito, vaayaamasatiyo pana kiriyato sa"ngahitaa honti.

[03] sammaadi.t.thisammaasa"nkappesupi pa~n~naa attano dhammataaya anicca.m dukkhamanattaati aaramma.na.m nicchetu.m na sakkoti. vitakke pana aako.tetvaa aako.tetvaa dente sakkoti. katha.m? yathaa hi hera~n~niko kahaapa.na.m hatthe .thapetvaa sabbabhaagesu oloketukaamo samaanopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetu.m sakkoti. a"ngulipabbehi pana parivattetvaa parivattetvaa ito cito ca oloketu.m sakkoti, evameva na pa~n~naa attano dhammataaya aniccaadivasena aaramma.na.m nicchetu.m sakkoti. abhiniropanalakkha.nena pana aahananapariyaahananarasena vitakkena aako.tentena viya parivattentena viya ca aadaayaadaaya dinnameva nicchetu.m sakkoti. tasmaa idhaapi sammaadi.t.thiyeva sajaatito pa~n~naakkhandhena sa"ngahitaa, sammaasa"nkappo pana kiriyavasena sa"ngahito hoti.
[03] iti imehi tiihi khandhehi maggo sa"ngaha.m gacchati. tena vutta.m ``tividho khandhattayabhedato''ti. catubbidho sotaapattimaggaadivaseneva.

[01] apica sabbaaneva saccaani ekavidhaani avitathattaa, abhi~n~neyyattaa vaa. duvidhaani lokiyalokuttarato, sa"nkhataasa"nkhatato vaa. tividhaani dassana-bhaavanaahi pahaatabbato, appahaatabbato ca. catubbidhaani pari~n~neyyaadibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhaadiihi vinicchayo veditabbo.
[03] 569^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabhaagavisabhaagato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0147^ea^ ^a^V2.0145^ea^ sabbaaneva saccaani a~n~nama~n~na.m sabhaagaani avitathato attasu~n~nato dukkarapa.tivedhato ca. yathaaha --

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, katama.m nu kho dukkaratara.m vaa durabhisambhavatara.m vaa, yo vaa duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaateyya po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m aviraadhita.m, yo vaa satadhaa bhinnassa vaalassa ko.tiyaa ko.ti.m pa.tivijjheyyaati? etadeva, bhante, dukkaratara~nceva durabhisambhavatara~nca, yo vaa satadhaa bhinnassa vaalassa ko.tiyaa ko.ti.m pa.tivijjheyyaati. tato kho te, aananda, duppa.tivijjhatara.m pa.tivijjhanti. ye ida.m dukkhanti yathaabhuuta.m pa.tivijjhanti...pe0... aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pa.tivijjhantii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1115).

[03] visabhaagaani salakkha.navavatthaanato. purimaani ca dve sabhaagaani duravagaahatthena gambhiirattaa lokiyattaa saasavattaa ca. visabhaagaani phalahetubhedato pari~n~neyyappahaatabbato ca. pacchimaanipi dve sabhaagaani gambhiirattena duravagaahattaa lokuttarattaa anaasavattaa ca. visabhaagaani visayavisayiibhedato sacchikaatabbabhaavetabbato ca. pa.thamatatiyaani caapi sabhaagaani phalaapadesato. visabhaagaani sa"nkhataasa"nkhatato. dutiyacatutthaani caapi sabhaagaani hetuapadesato. visabhaagaani ekantakusalaakusalato. pa.thamacatutthaani caapi sabhaagaani sa"nkhatato. visabhaagaani lokiyalokuttarato. dutiyatatiyaani caapi sabhaagaani nevasekkhaanaasekkhabhaavato. visabhaagaani saaramma.naanaaramma.nato.
[21] iti eva.m pakaarehi, nayehi ca vicakkha.no.
[22] vija~n~naa ariyasaccaana.m, sabhaagavisabhaagatanti..
[06] iti saadhujanapaamojjatthaaya kate visuddhimagge
[06] pa~n~naabhaavanaadhikaare
[06] indriyasaccaniddeso naama
[06] so.lasamo paricchedo.

[03] 570^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M2.0148^ea^ ^a^V2.0146^ea^ ``khandhaayatanadhaatuindriyasaccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadibhedaa dhammaa bhuumii''ti eva.m vuttesu imissaa pa~n~naaya bhuumibhuutesu dhammesu yasmaa pa.ticcasamuppaadoceva, aadisaddena sa"ngahitaa pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa ca avasesaa honti, tasmaa tesa.m va.n.nanaakkamo anuppatto.
[03] tattha avijjaadayo taava dhammaa ^b^pa.ticcasamuppaado^eb^ti veditabbaa. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado? avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.1).
[03] jaraamara.naadayo pana ^b^pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa^eb^ti veditabbaa. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa? jaraamara.na.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m khayadhamma.m vayadhamma.m viraagadhamma.m nirodhadhamma.m. jaati, bhikkhave...pe0... bhavo... upaadaana.m... ta.nhaa... vedanaa... phasso... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaaraa... avijjaa, bhikkhave, aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa ^a^V2.0147^ea^ khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.20).

[03] 571^b^.^eb^ aya.m panettha sa"nkhepo. ^b^pa.ticcasamuppaado^eb^ti paccayadhammaa veditabbaa. ^b^pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa^eb^ti tehi tehi paccayehi nibbattadhammaa. kathamida.m jaanitabbanti ^a^M2.0149^ea^ ce? bhagavato vacanena. bhagavataa hi pa.ticcasamuppaadapa.ticcasamuppannadhammadesanaasutte --

[02] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado? jaatipaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m, uppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m .thitaava saa dhaatu dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa idappaccayataa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti, abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~napeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti, passathaati caaha. jaatipaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m. bhavapaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaati...pe0... avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa uppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m...pe0... uttaaniikaroti passathaati caaha. avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. iti kho, bhikkhave, yaa tatra tathataa avitathataa ana~n~nathataa idappaccayataa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.20).

[03] 572^b^.^eb^ eva.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m desentena tathataadiihi vevacanehi paccayadhammaava pa.ticcasamuppaadoti vuttaa. tasmaa jaraamara.naadiina.m dhammaana.m paccayalakkha.no pa.ticcasamuppaado, dukkhaanubandhanaraso, kummaggapaccupa.t.thaanoti veditabbo.

[03] so panaaya.m tehi tehi paccayehi anuunaadhikeheva tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato ^b^tathataa^eb^ti, saamaggi.m upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi tato nibbattadhammaana.m asambhavaabhaavato ^b^avitathataa^eb^ti, a~n~nadhammapaccayehi a~n~nadhammaanuppattito ^b^ana~n~nathataa^eb^ti, yathaavuttaana.m etesa.m jaraamara.naadiina.m paccayato vaa paccayasamuuhato vaa ^b^idappaccayataa^eb^ti vutto.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ tatraaya.m vacanattho, imesa.m paccayaa idappaccayaa. idappaccayaa eva ^b^idappaccayataa^eb^. idappaccayaana.m vaa samuuho ^b^idappaccayataa^eb^. lakkha.na.m panettha saddasatthato pariyesitabba.m.

[03] 574^b^.^eb^ keci ^a^V2.0148^ea^ pana pa.ticca sammaa ca titthiyaparikappitapakatipurisaadikaara.nanirapekkho uppaado pa.ticcasamuppaadoti eva.m uppaadamatta.m pa.ticcasamuppaadoti vadanti ^a^M2.0150^ea^, ta.m na yujjati. kasmaa? suttaabhaavato, suttavirodhato, gambhiiranayaasambhavato, saddabhedato ca. ``uppaadamatta.m pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti hi sutta.m natthi. ta.m ``pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti ca vadantassa padesavihaarasuttavirodho aapajjati. katha.m? bhagavato hi ``atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anulomapa.tiloma.m manasaakaasii''ti (mahaava0 1) aadivacanato pa.ticcasamuppaadamanasikaaro pa.thamaabhisambuddhavihaaro, padesavihaaro ca tassekadesavihaaro. yathaaha ``yena svaaha.m, bhikkhave, vihaarena pa.thamaabhisambuddho viharaami, tassa padesena vihaasi''nti (sa.m0 ni0 5.11). tatra ca paccayaakaaradassanena vihaasi, na uppaadamattadassanenaati. yathaaha ``so eva.m pajaanaami micchaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m sammaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m micchaasa"nkappapaccayaapi vedayita''nti (sa.m0 ni0 5.11) sabba.m vitthaaretabba.m. eva.m uppaadamatta.m ``pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti vadantassa padesavihaarasuttavirodho aapajjati. tathaa kaccaanasuttavirodho.

[03] kaccaanasuttepi hi ``lokasamudaya.m kho, kaccaana, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato yaa loke natthitaa, saa na hotii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.15) anulomapa.ticcasamuppaado lokapaccayato ``lokasamudayo''ti ucchedadi.t.thisamugghaatattha.m pakaasito, na uppaadamatta.m. na hi uppaadamattadassanena ucchedadi.t.thiyaa samugghaato hoti. paccayaanuparamadassanena pana hoti. paccayaanuparame phalaanuparamatoti. eva.m uppaadamatta.m ``pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti vadantassa kaccaanasuttavirodhopi aapajjati.

[03] ^b^gambhiiranayaasambhavato^eb^ti vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa ``gambhiiro caaya.m, aananda, pa.ticcasamuppaado gambhiiraavabhaaso caa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.95; sa.m0 ni0 2.60). gambhiiratta~nca naama catubbidha.m, ta.m parato va.n.nayissaama. ta.m uppaadamatte natthi. catubbidhanayapa.tima.n.dita~nceta.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m va.n.nayanti, tampi nayacatukka.m uppaadamatte natthiiti gambhiiranayaasambhavatopi na uppaadamatta.m pa.ticcasamuppaado.

[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddabhedato^eb^ti pa.ticcasaddo ca panaaya.m samaane kattari pubbakaale payujjamaano atthasiddhikaro ^a^V2.0149^ea^ hoti. seyyathida.m, ``cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na''nti (sa.m0 ni0 2.43). idha pana bhaavasaadhanena uppaadasaddena ^a^M2.0151^ea^ saddhi.m payujjamaano samaanassa kattu abhaavato saddabheda.m gacchati, na ca ki~nci attha.m saadhetiiti saddabhedatopi na uppaadamatta.m pa.ticcasamuppaadoti.

[03] tattha siyaa -- ``hoti-saddena saddhi.m yojayissaama `pa.ticcasamuppaado hotii'ti'', ta.m na yutta.m. kasmaa? yogaabhaavato ceva, uppaadassa ca uppaadapattidosato. ``pa.ticcasamuppaada.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado...pe0... aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.1). imesu hi padesu ekenapi saddhi.m hoti-saddo yoga.m na gacchati, na ca uppaado hoti. sace bhaveyya, uppaadassaapi uppaado paapu.neyyaati.

[03] 576^b^.^eb^ yepi ma~n~nanti ``idappaccayaana.m bhaavo idappaccayataa, ^b^bhaavo^eb^ ca naama yo aakaaro avijjaadiina.m sa"nkhaaraadipaatubhaave hetu, so. tasmi~nca sa"nkhaaravikaare pa.ticcasamuppaadasa~n~naa''ti, tesa.m ta.m na yujjati. kasmaa? avijjaadiina.m hetuvacanato. bhagavataa hi ``tasmaatiha, aananda, eseva hetu, eta.m nidaana.m, esa samudayo, esa paccayo jaraamara.nassa yadida.m jaati...pe0... sa"nkhaaraana.m, yadida.m avijjaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.98 aadayo) eva.m avijjaadayova hetuuti vuttaa, na tesa.m vikaaro. tasmaa ``pa.ticcasamuppaadoti paccayadhammaa veditabbaa''ti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, ta.m sammaa vuttanti veditabba.m.
[03] 577^b^.^eb^ yaa panettha ``pa.ticcasamuppaado''ti imaaya bya~njanacchaayaaya uppaadoyevaaya.m vuttoti sa~n~naa uppajjati, saa imassa padassa evamattha.m gahetvaa vuupasametabbaa. bhagavataa hi,
[21] dvedhaa tato pavatte, dhammasamuuhe yato ida.m vacana.m.
[22] tappaccayo tatoya.m, phalopacaarena iti vutto..

[03] yo hi aya.m paccayataaya pavatto dhammasamuuho, tattha pa.ticcasamuppaadoti ida.m vacana.m dvidhaa icchanti. so hi yasmaa patiiyamaano hitaaya sukhaaya ca sa.mvattati, tasmaa paccetumarahanti ^a^V2.0150^ea^ na.m pa.n.ditaati pa.ticco. uppajjamaano ca saha sammaa ca uppajjati, na ekekato, naapi ahetutoti samuppaado. eva.m pa.ticco ca so samuppaado caati pa.ticcasamuppaado ^a^M2.0152^ea^. apica saha uppajjatiiti samuppaado, paccayasaamaggi.m pana pa.ticca apaccakkhaayaati evampi pa.ticcasamuppaado. tassa caaya.m hetusamuuho paccayoti tappaccayattaa ayampi, yathaa loke semhassa paccayo gu.lo ^b^semho gu.lo^eb^ti vuccati, yathaa ca saasane sukhappaccayo buddhaana.m uppaado ``sukho buddhaana.m uppaado''ti vuccati, tathaa pa.ticcasamuppaado icceva phalavohaarena vuttoti veditabbo.
[03] 578^b^.^eb^ atha vaa,
[21] pa.timukhamitoti vutto, hetusamuuho aya.m pa.ticcoti.
[22] sahite uppaadeti ca, iti vutto so samuppaado..

[01] yo hi esa sa"nkhaaraadiina.m paatubhaavaaya avijjaadiekekahetusiisena niddi.t.tho hetusamuuho, so saadhaara.naphalanipphaadaka.t.thena avekalla.t.thena ca saamaggia"ngaana.m a~n~nama~n~nena pa.timukha.m ito gatoti katvaa pa.ticcoti vuccati. svaaya.m sahiteyeva a~n~nama~n~na.m avinibbhogavuttidhamme uppaadetiiti samuppaadotipi vutto. evampi pa.ticco ca so samuppaado caati pa.ticcasamuppaado.
